channel.title: [508]exception in "thread-4" when i log in[508]
channel.description:
hey i have a little problem
only when i log in i get this error [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at RSString.method1612(RSString.java:856) at Class21.method336(Class21.java:188) at Class21.method350(Class21.java:520) at Class61.method598(Class61.java:337) at client.method33(client.java:765) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:485) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:156) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
my run.bat looks like this [code]@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0 pause[/code]
i know that this has to do with heap space i googled it
but the wierd thing is: only with my account (whattehp) the client crashes not with a new account or that one of a friend probably my account is fucked up
but ill ask mopar first
so plaese help and do not flame
tyvm WhatTehP
-owner/coder of OMGscape (currently under developement)

item.title: [508]exception in "thread-4" when i log in[508]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

hey i have a little problem

only when i log in i get this error

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at RSString.method1612(RSString.java:856) at Class21.method336(Class21.java:188) at Class21.method350(Class21.java:520) at Class61.method598(Class61.java:337) at client.method33(client.java:765) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:485) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:156) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

my run.bat looks like this

@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game0 pause

i know that this has to do with heap space
i googled it

but the wierd thing is:
only with my account (whattehp) the client crashes not with a new account or that one of a friend
probably my account is fucked up

but ill ask mopar first

so plaese help and do not flame

tyvm WhatTehP

                         -owner/coder of OMGscape (currently under developement)
